Title: Akatsuki no Yona
Description: ["Princess Yona lives a life of luxury and ease, completely sheltered from the problems of the seemingly peaceful Kingdom of Kouka; however, the sudden murder of the king and betrayal of her beloved cousin Su-won places Yona's life in mortal peril. Forced to escape only with Son Hak, who is both her childhood friend and bodyguard, the na√Øve princess soon discovers that Kouka is not the idyllic place she envisioned it to be. Poverty, strife, and corruption run rampant, making reclaiming the throne nothing more than a wishful fantasy given the kingdom's current state.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Based on the popular manga of the same name by Mizuho Kusanagi, ', Akatsuki no Yona, ' follows Princess Yona on a coming-of-age adventure as she faces the harsh realities of her kingdom. With only a mysterious legend to guide her, Yona must discover a way to restore Kouka to its former glory while being pursued relentlessly by the forces of the new King of Kouka.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]']
Voices: ['Takagaki, Ayahi', 'Saitou, Chiwa', 'Kobayashi, Sanae', 'Suwabe, Junichi', 'Morita, Masakazu', 'Minagawa, Junko', 'Shimono, Hiro', 'Yamamoto, Nozomi', 'Yamamoto, Nozomi', 'Miyamoto, Mitsuru']
Staff: [['Yoneda, Kazuhiro', 'Director, Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Nagasaki, Yukio', 'Sound Director'], ['Andou, Takashi', 'Episode Director'], ['Kidokoro, Seimei', 'Episode Director, Storyboard']]
